meaningMnemonic: You take a <radical>stool</radical>, another <radical>stool</radical>, and yet another <radical>stool</radical> and stack them on top of a <radical>tree</radical> to make a <kanji>mulberry</kanji> bush. This is how mulberry bushes are made. You take three stools and you put them atop a tree.
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>mulberry</kanji> tree then produces a <reading>qua</reading>ntity (くわ) of mulberries. Yum.
